title: Non-verbal hypnosis for feminine energy / Part 1
description:
The woman in the video wanted to awaken her feminine energy. Non-verbal hypnosis can connects us to our positive energy and to bring us a deep transformation. The both girls are students of Dr. Marco Paret, which participated in his recent non-verbal hypnosis masterclass in Brazil. They practiced the most powerful techniques in the nature and achieved strong results. See what happens in the next part of this video, where the non-verbal hypnosis experience continues. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
